item.title: Insights about NUMBER26
item.description: Here are a few examples of what one can do with a little bit of R code, some open data & a few free hours on the weekend. Competition & Growth Analysis Twitter Performance Dashboard

item.title: Wikipedia Data
item.description: At this point, just a note to myself about all of the myriad ways one can access Wikipedia data and what they are good for: R Packages Pageview Data Pageviews: Wrapper for the latest official wikimedia pageview API. Offers the greatest detail including breakdown by device type (desktop/mobile) and traffic type (user/bot) for daily pageview data. Data available starting in Sept 2015. wikipediatrend: Cool package that draws upon the legacy pageviews api, [stats.
